To apply for an undergraduate place at Leeds Trinity &
All Saints you must apply via UCAS
(Universities and Colleges Admissions Service). You must
make your application on-line, using Apply at www.ucas.com/apply.
This is the quickest and simplest way to apply for a course
and enables you to check the progress of your application
For help and advice about your application you can contact:

Please read carefully the guidance notes included with

comprehensive as possible, and include all the required
